text: Antonio Rastrelli (15 October 1927 â€“ 15 August 2019) was an Italian politician and lawyer. He was born in Portici, Italy. Rastrelli was a member of the Senate from 1979 to 1994 and was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1994 to 1995. Rastrelli was President of Campania from 1995 to 1999. Rastrelli died on 15 August 2019 at the age of 91.Centrodestra, morto a 91 anni Antonio Rastrelli ==References== ==Other websites== *Family website Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Campania Category:Italian lawyers
title: Antonio Rastrelli
